scripts.start: rm -rf build && tsc && SWAGGEN_TEMPLATE_ROOT=$PWD/src/templates node build/index.js --clean --out gen test.yaml --target cloudflare --capabilities log
scripts.gen:cloudflare: rm -rf build && tsc && SWAGGEN_TEMPLATE_ROOT=$PWD/src/templates node build/index.js --clean --out experiment/cloudflare/src/service test.yaml --target cloudflare --capabilities log
scripts.gen:lambda: rm -rf build && tsc && SWAGGEN_TEMPLATE_ROOT=$PWD/src/templates node build/index.js --clean --out experiment/lambda/src/service test.yaml --target lambda --capabilities log
scripts.gen:express: rm -rf build && tsc && SWAGGEN_TEMPLATE_ROOT=$PWD/src/templates node build/index.js --clean --out experiment/express/src/service test.yaml --target express --capabilities log
scripts.experiment: node build/index.js --clean --out experiment/src/service test.yaml --target express --capabilities log
scripts.dist: gulp && cd dist && npm publish --access public && cd ../dist.types && npm publish --access public
